title: Remove selected main-page container elements

requirements.text: Remove (do not render) the UI element located at XPath `/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[1]` from the page. Apply the change only to this selected element (and its subtree) and do not modify other parts of the UI.
acceptanceCriteria: The element at XPath `/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[1]` is no longer present in the DOM at runtime.
No blank/extra spacing remains where the removed element used to be (layout reflows cleanly).
No console errors are introduced by the removal.

requirements.text: Remove (do not render) the UI element located at XPath `/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]` from the page. Apply the change only to this selected element (and its subtree) and do not modify other parts of the UI.
acceptanceCriteria: The element at XPath `/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]` is no longer present in the DOM at runtime.
No blank/extra spacing remains where the removed element used to be (layout reflows cleanly).
No console errors are introduced by the removal.

constraints: Apply changes ONLY to the two selected elements identified by the provided XPaths; do not alter unrelated UI or behavior.
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Do not add new features or new pages.
Do not modify backend canister logic.
